title: "egnite, Inc. Presented New Data on the Use of Artificial Intelligence to Predict the Progression of Aortic Stenosis at TCT 2021 Conference"
excerpt: "Inc. presented new data at the Transcatheter Cardiovascular Therapeutics (TCT) 2021 conference held November 4-6. The presentation showcased the proven accuracy and results of artificial intelligence (AI) powered algorithms to accurately predict the likelihood a patient with moderate aortic stenosis (AS) would later be diagnosed with severe AS over a 1- and 2-year period."
